additional_info:
Business Center, Kitchen, Internet, Security, Alarm System, Elevator, Heating - Conditioning, Heating system: central, Hot water: gas 
 100 sq.m. Office Space. Besiki Business Centre is multifunctional complex in the center of Tbilisi, across from the Tbilisi Marriott Hotel on 4 Besiki Street. Multifunctional complex consists of: Living spaces, hotel, offices and commercial areas. Business Centre has three floor underground parking area which can accommodate up to 183 cars. Central Conditioning and heating system contributes maximum comfort for its users. 24 hour security, concierge services, high class Elevators will meet all requirements.

details.address: Tbilisi, Old Tbilisi,  Mtatsminda, Besiki st.
